column4: hey, anyone use banshee?? im trying to figure out how to get a menu where i can select the artist, kinda like this guy has it on the left. http://static.flickr.com/84/221362196_0a7d988658_o.png
i have tried, dont like it much. i like songbird the best of all. but it cant minimize to tray yet. so i dont use it
